title: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Long Sleeve Oxford Shirt
description: Classic Fit: our roomiest silhouette. Cut for a lower armhole and a fuller sleeve. Multicolored signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
Size medium has a 31½" back body length and a 34½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck.
Button-down point collar. Buttoned placket. Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Split back yoke with a box pleat ensures a comfortable fit and a greater range of motion.
Polo Ralph Lauren Mens Classic Long Sleeve Oxford Shirt
